AZURITE_DESC: Some gems have hidden qualities beyond their luster, beyond their shine... Azurite is one of those gems.
BLOODSTONE_DESC: Origin of the Bloodstone is unknown, hence its low value. It has a very high shine and 12 sides, however.
ZIRCON_DESC: Zircon is our most coveted and sought after gem. You will pay much to be the proud owner of this gorgeous and high shine gem.
